alert.note: Alert for Antelope; Knox; Madison; Pierce (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 1:56AM CDT until July 24 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Madison County in northeastern Nebraska... Pierce County in northeastern Nebraska... Northeastern Antelope County in northeastern Nebraska... South central Knox County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 155 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Creighton, or 23 miles north of Neligh, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Plainview around 210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Osmond and Pierce. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
